channel.title: Comments on: PIC18F2550 MAX114 4-Channel ADC
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Rony Chakraborty
item.dc:creator: Rony Chakraborty
item.description: Hi Is this project completed? is it working like written here.
item.content:encoded: Hi Is this project completed? is it working like written here.

item.title: By: Ruwantha
item.dc:creator: Ruwantha
item.description: Hi, Actually, I can't believe this result. I tried to interface high speed adc to PIC18f4550 microcontroller but i couldn't read the port very fast. any way well done...!
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
Actually, I can’t believe this result. I tried to interface high speed adc to PIC18f4550 microcontroller but i couldn’t read the port very fast. any way well done…!

item.title: By: TERiggs
item.dc:creator: TERiggs
item.description: I am truly impressed have you considered kitting or producing some of these for sale or at least a pc board with a pre programed chip?? I would be interested. Thanks
item.content:encoded:
I am truly impressed have you considered kitting or producing some of these for sale or at least a pc board with a pre programed chip?? I would be interested.
Thanks

item.title: By: Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
could i get the source so i can compile for an 18f4550 instead of the 18f2550 as i have a few of these laying about and the nice people at maxim have sent me samples of the max114 and i'm looking to recreate the project
thanks
item.content:encoded:
could i get the source so i can compile for an 18f4550 instead of the 18f2550 as i have a few of these laying about and the nice people at maxim have sent me samples of the max114 and i’m looking to recreate the project

thanks

item.title: By: Martin Wong
item.dc:creator: Martin Wong
item.description: How can I make combine this with the previous PIC18F2550 USB HID Oscilloscope and then connect with my PC with USB?
item.content:encoded: How can I make combine this with the previous PIC18F2550 USB HID Oscilloscope and then connect with my PC with USB?
